data.name: Contact_Subtitle
data.value: We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.

data.name: Contact_Snackbar_AgreeTerms
data.value: Please agree to the terms and conditions

data.name: Contact_Snackbar_Thanks
data.value: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you soon.

data.name: Home_Lead
data.value: Organize student housing operations with our cloud-first platform. Manage residences, students, payments and more — all in one place.

data.name: Features_Header
data.value: Everything you need to manage student housing

data.name: Feature_ResidenceManagement_Desc
data.value: Multi-residence, room and facility management with an intuitive interface.

data.name: Feature_StudentPortal_Desc
data.value: Empower students with self-service tools for room selection, payments and support.

data.name: Feature_PaymentProcessing_Desc
data.value: Secure and automated payment collection with multiple payment method support.

data.name: Feature_ComplaintManagement_Desc
data.value: Track and resolve student complaints efficiently with a ticketing workflow.

data.name: Feature_Analytics_Desc
data.value: Gain insights with comprehensive reports and live dashboards.

data.name: Feature_Security_Desc
data.value: Enterprise-grade security with role-based access control and audit logging.

data.name: CTA_Body
data.value: Join thousands of institutions that trust SRMS to manage student housing efficiently and effectively.

data.name: Desc_DarkMode
data.value: Enable dark mode for the user interface.

data.name: Desc_CompactMode
data.value: Enable compact mode for the user interface.

data.name: Login_SignInAccess
data.value: Sign in to access your account

data.name: Login_Error_NoEmailFromGoogle
data.value: Could not retrieve email from Google.

data.name: Login_Error_UserNotFound
data.value: User not found. Please register first.

data.name: Logout_PleaseWait
data.value: Please wait while we log you out...

data.name: Logout_RedirectMessage
data.value: You will be redirected to the login page shortly

data.name: Faq5_A
data.value: Room changes are subject to availability and approval. Contact your residence manager to request a room change. They will review your request and inform you of the decision.

data.name: Error_ProcessingMessage
data.value: An error occurred while processing your request.

data.name: Error_DevelopmentMode_Desc1
data.value: Swapping to the Development environment will display more detailed information about the error that occurred.

data.name: Error_DevelopmentMode_Desc2
data.value: The Development environment shouldn't be enabled for deployed applications. It can result in displaying sensitive information from exceptions to end users. For local debugging, enable the Development environment by setting the ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT environment variable to Development and restarting the app.

data.name: VerifyEmail_VerifyingMessage
data.value: Please wait while we verify your account...

data.name: VerifyEmail_Success_Message
data.value: Your email has been successfully verified. Welcome to the Student Residence Management System!

data.name: VerifyEmail_Error_DefaultMessage
data.value: Email verification failed. The verification code may be invalid or expired.

data.name: VerifyEmail_Error_InvalidFormat
data.value: Invalid verification link format. Please check the link and try again.

data.name: VerifyEmail_NeedHelp_Text
data.value: Need help? Contact support or try these options:

data.name: VerifyEmail_Snackbar_Success
data.value: Email verified successfully! Welcome to SRMS.

data.value: This password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.

data.name: ResetPassword_Helper_PasswordRules
data.value: Min 8 characters, uppercase, lowercase, number, special symbol

data.name: ResetPassword_Success_Subtitle
data.value: Your password has been successfully reset. You can now log in with your new password.

data.name: ResetPassword_Snackbar_ResetSuccess
data.value: Password reset successfully! Redirecting to login...

data.name: ResetPassword_Error_FailedReset
data.value: Failed to reset password. The link may be expired or invalid.

data.name: Register_Subtitle_Join
data.value: Join the Student Residence Management System

data.name: Register_Helper_EmailVerification
data.value: We'll send a verification link to this email

data.name: Register_Helper_PasswordRules
data.value: Min 8 characters: uppercase, lowercase, number & special symbol

data.name: About_Subtitle
data.value: Revolutionizing student residence management with cutting-edge technology and exceptional service

data.name: About_Vision_Description
data.value: To be the leading platform for student residence management, delivering seamless experiences for students, managers, and administrators worldwide through innovative technology and exceptional service delivery.

data.name: About_Mission_Description
data.value: To simplify and enhance the student housing experience by providing a comprehensive, user-friendly platform that connects students with quality accommodation while empowering administrators with powerful management tools.

data.name: About_Feature_FastEfficient_Description
data.value: Streamlined processes that save time and reduce administrative burden

data.name: About_Feature_MultiPlatform_Description
data.value: Access from any device - desktop, tablet, or mobile

data.name: About_Feature_247Support_Description
data.value: Round-the-clock customer support to assist you anytime

data.name: About_Feature_CloudBased_Description
data.value: Scalable cloud infrastructure for optimal performance
